create_pattern_schematics.ponder.schemat: To use paturn skematiks, yuh mus furst saiv a skematic to uz as a sauze
Then, uz a skematik taibl wif an no bee fildz paturn skematic
Uz the taibl to shootz the skematik
Then, uzin the cloan tuul in the opchonz, the thingy can be repetd
Clunez get shootedz next to each Othez
Adiptipomally, the skematikz cun be spunz rund
This spinzz will then atak to al cloanz
create_pattern_schematics.ponder.train_s: A loaner paturn skematik cun be aplyde to a growpz of themz azmbled pointrz with Cowch + ringth clickl
tHere, thugh skematik huz Ben plazd as a normiez
Butt movin da trayn ovr ther wul resulz in the skematik repetatetinz
create_pattern_schematics.schematic.tool: Selekt an usz [CTRL]-Scroll to cloan in da curenz lukin directonz.
Alternyenatively, [CTRL+SHIFT]-Scroll too cloam on da selecd surrfac.
item.create_pattern_schematics.empty_pat: Cun be writn tuh meke un _bigzr verzion of Crate's skematik_ which alous cuntractions and skemtikanons to _repet a desine_ multipl timz.
item.create_pattern_schematics.pattern_s: An _bigerz vurshon of Crate's skematik_ whikh alous cuntractions and skemtikanons to _repet a desine_ multipl timz.
